neighbors.name: MDT Investments Ltd Pship
neighbors.claims: MDT Investments Ltd Partnership is a private landholding entity with a registered address in Phoenix, Arizona ([Homes.com](https://www.homes.com/property/2929-n-47th-ave-phoenix-az/z0z9mcv61f42r/)). The Arizona Corporation Commission database contains no active domestic corporate registration for this exact name, suggesting it may be a legacy limited partnership or registered via the Secretary of State ([ecorp.azcc.gov](https://ecorp.azcc.gov/BusinessSearch/BusinessInfo?entityNumber=01077022)). Public records link the entity to property transactions involving Malcolm D. Taylor in the mid-1990s, indicating a potential family trust or legacy ownership structure ([Homes.com](https://www.homes.com/property/2929-n-47th-ave-phoenix-az/z0z9mcv61f42r/)). No active business operations, websites, or public notices were found for the partnership in Pinal County, consistent with a passive land-holding strategy. Pinal County farmers face significant water cutbacks, a regional issue that typically makes agricultural landholders sensitive to development impacts on water resources ([Fox 10 Phoenix](https://www.fox10phoenix.com/news/some-pinal-county-farmers-facing-stark-choice-as-drought-persists)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Passive entity with no visible leadership or recent political activity in the county.

approach_recommendations.engage: Contact via the Phoenix mailing address associated with tax records; treat as a passive investor; emphasize low water usage of the proposed project compared to agriculture.

neighbors.profile_summary: Private limited partnership with legacy holdings; appears to be a passive investment vehicle with no active local footprint.

citations.claim: No active domestic corporate registration found
citations.title: Arizona Corporation Commission Entity Search

citations.claim: Pinal County farmers face significant water cutbacks
citations.title: Some Pinal County farmers facing stark choice as drought persists

neighbors.name: Dye Equities LLC et al
neighbors.claims: Dye Equities LLC is an Arizona limited liability company associated with the Dye family, prominent in the region's industrial gas and welding supply industry (Phoenix Welding Supply) ([Phoenix Welding Supply History](https://phxwelding.com/history/)). The entity has appeared in Arizona Corporation Commission dockets related to water utility regulation, specifically filing comments in Global Water Resources cases, indicating active engagement in land-use and utility infrastructure matters ([ACC eDocket](https://edocket.azcc.gov/search/docket-search/item-detail/13404)). The LLC is also linked to equine investments, with records listing "Dye Equities and Gil Dye" as buyers in thoroughbred transactions ([Equibase](https://www.equibase.com/profiles/Results.cfm?type=Horse&refno=4469244&registry=T&rbt=TB)). While the entity itself functions as a land-holding vehicle, the principals have deep local business roots and established regulatory awareness ([Phoenix Welding Supply History](https://phxwelding.com/history/)). General regional concerns regarding water availability likely apply to their agricultural land holdings ([Fox 10 Phoenix](https://www.fox10phoenix.com/news/some-pinal-county-farmers-facing-stark-choice-as-drought-persists)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Principals are established business owners (Phoenix Welding Supply) with a history of engagement in utility regulatory dockets.

approach_recommendations.engage: Leverage the family's business background; approach with technical competence regarding utility infrastructure; acknowledge their sophistication in regulatory matters.

neighbors.profile_summary: Land-holding entity for the Dye family (Phoenix Welding Supply); actively engaged in regional water utility regulation.

citations.claim: Associated with the Dye family (Phoenix Welding Supply)

neighbors.name: Torino Holdings LLC
neighbors.claims: Torino Holdings LLC is an affiliate of Torino Group, Inc., a real estate development and management firm based in Carlsbad, California, with active operations in Arizona ([Torino Group About Us](https://www.torinogroupinc.com/about-us/)). The firm is led by President Cole C.P. Torino and specializes in multi-family residential development and property repositioning ([Torino Group About Us](https://www.torinogroupinc.com/about-us/)). Corporate filings link Torino Holdings LLC to the same management structure, confirming it serves as a holding vehicle for the group's real estate assets ([BizProfile](https://www.bizprofile.net/principal-address/1497-sw-martin-downs-blvd-palm-city-fl-34990)). The company explicitly lists Arizona as a key market for its construction and development activities ([Torino Group Construction](https://www.torinogroupinc.com/construction/)). Given their developer profile, their interest in the parcel is likely strategic investment or future development potential rather than long-term passive holding ([Torino Group About Us](https://www.torinogroupinc.com/about-us/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Professional real estate developer with cross-state operations; holds significant capital resources but leadership is out-of-state.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage directly with Cole C.P. Torino or corporate leadership; frame proposals in terms of development synergies or exit strategies; appeal to their developer mindset.

neighbors.profile_summary: Affiliate of Torino Group Inc., a California-based developer with Arizona operations; parcel is likely held for future development or investment.
